item.description:
Our weekly meetups include one or two meditations, discussion about mindfulness practice, and listening the recordings or readings from meditation and spiritual teachers. We welcome all levels of mindfulness practitioners, and encourage you to join us in spiritual community as we share our experiences with the aspiration of greater presence and awareness in our lives.

“Being human means discovering our fullness and learning to live from it. This involves bringing forth more of who we really are and becoming more available to whatever life presents.”
John Welwood
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be meeting people at the door until about 6:05pm.
item.name: Portland Mindfulness Meetup
